message: iQIES S&C functionality will be unavailable from Saturday, October 16, 2021 11 AM ET until Sunday, October 17, 2021 8 AM ET, for scheduled maintenance.

Beginning Friday, November 19 at 8:00 ET there will be a system downtime that prevents HHA, IRF, and LTCH providers from submitting assessments and accessing reports in iQIES.  This downtime is expected to last approximately three hours.
